basketball.description: #4/5 Syracuse (7-0), fresh off a victory in the EA Sports Maui Invitational, returns to the mainland to take on rv/23 Indiana (6-1) in the Big 10/ACC Challenge on December 3. It’s a rematch of a 2013 NCAA Tournament “Sweet 16” game from March 28. The Orange defeated the Hoosiers, 61-50, and ultimately advanced to the Final Four

football.description: The 2014 Syracuse football season gets underway on Saturday, April 19 with the annual Spring game at the Carrier Dome. All Orange fans are invited to enjoy a fun-filled day at the Dome that includes promotional giveaways, an opportunity to 'Select A Seat' for the 2014 season, a team poster, and a free hot dog and soda.

lecture.description: Recently named a co-host to CNN’s Crossfire reboot, Van Jones is president and co-founder of Rebuild the Dream, a platform for bottom-up, people-powered innovations to help fix the U.S. economy. A Yale-educated attorney, Jones has written two New York Times Best Sellers: “The Green Collar Economy,” the definitive book on green jobs, and “Rebuild the Dream,” a roadmap for progressives in 2012 and beyond.

volunteer.description: Since the spring of 2009, Ignatian Volunteers have been established in the Diocese of Syracuse. We currently have volunteers working at service sites in and around Syracuse. These volunteers work at agencies that serve the poor, the homeless, immigrants, refugees, –those who are materially in need.

concert.description: Hooligan's Holiday, Live Wire, Shout at the Devil, Wild Side, Uncle Jack, Dr. Feelgood, Misunderstood, Kickstart My Heart, Home Sweet Home, Revolution, Driftaway, Don't Go Away Mad (Just Go Away), Hammered, Primal Scream

graduation.description: The Graduate School offers over 200 degree programs among its 10 schools and colleges and awards approximately 1,600 Master's degrees each year. Since its founding in 1870, the Graduate School has been a leader in quality graduate education among its peers in higher education.

CD.TITLE: When a man loves a woman
